attributes.action: save the closure of care companies
attributes.additional_details: Powys County Council put out to tender all care services in Powys resulting in 4  big care companies winning by undercutting the 24 care companies based in Powys The company Caring Concern Ltd and others face the possibility of going out of business please help save these small busineses

rejection.details: Please can this be rejected on the grounds that this is a devolved issue.
